title: How many words does an average person read in 3, 5 and 10 minutes? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I was in grade school, we had a speed reading class. I was reading 500WPM but I didn't like my comprehension rate. I like to have 100% comprehension. Why would you except less? I read a little less then that, way less if I'm tired or what I'm reading is difficult of critical (Wiring your home, understanding a lawsuit, or preparing for a test)

Can?  I'd say about 300 a minute, so 900, 1500, 3000. Does? Depends on where they are and what they're doing.  Plenty of 'average' people read zero words a minute.  Plenty of 'average' people live in sign-and-symbol-saturated environments where they encounter words everywhere they look. Plenty of 'average' people spend a lot of time reading stuphs on the interwebz.
